5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Qatadah that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“When one of you enters the mosque, let him perform two Rak’ah before he sits down.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ دَخَلَ الْمَسْجِدَ فَلاَ يَجْلِسْ حَتَّى يَرْكَعَ
chapter.eng-name: The one who enters the mosque should not sit down until he performs some Rak’ah
